text: Andrzej Franciszek Zieliński (20 August 1936 – 8 December 2021) was a Polish athlete. Zieliński was born in Warsaw. He competed at the 1964 Summer Olympics held in Tokyo, Japan, where he won the silver medal for the 4 x 100 metre relay. Zieliński died on 8 December 2021 in Warsaw, at the age of 85.Nie żyje Andrzej Zieliński ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympic silver medalists for Poland Category:Sportspeople from Warsaw Category:Polish sprinters
title: Andrzej Zieliński (athlete)
